# SY23-24

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: columns
::: {.column width="70%"}
## [Ongoing Report](https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/OngoingReport_23_24/)

A fully compiled, updating, interactive AI-utilizing report for all L&R data representing each part of the Guskey Framework. Sections do not correspond exactly to the guskey framework but are enumerated on the context page. Additionally includes a PDS page in the last section where all PDS data can be accessed.
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
```{r ongoing-report, out.width=450, echo=F}
knitr::include_graphics("Images/Reports/ongoing_report.png")
```
:::
:::
